amendment.description: To restore funding for the trade adjustment assistance program to the level established by the Trade Adjustment Assistance Extension Act of 2011.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1242, under the order of 5/14/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 41. Record Vote Number: 181.

action.text: Amendment SA 1242 proposed by Senator Brown to Amendment SA 1221. (consideration: CR S2926-2927; text: CR S2926) To restore funding for the trade adjustment assistance program to the level established by the Trade Adjustment Assistance Extension Act of 2011.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1242, under the order of 5/14/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 41. Record Vote Number: 181.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1242 proposed by Senator Brown to Amendment SA 1221.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1242, under the order of 5/14/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 41. Record Vote Number: 181.
